Item 5.02 - Departure of Directors or Ce.content: Johnson & Johnson (the “Company”) announced on February 15, 2022, that Darius Adamczyk, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Honeywell, has been appointed to its Board of Directors (the “Board”), effective immediately. Mr. Adamczyk will serve as a member of the Board’s Audit Committee and Compensation & Benefits Committee, effective as of April 28, 2022. As a non-employee Director of the Company, Mr. Adamczyk will receive compensation as described in the “Director Compensation” section of the Company's 2022 Proxy Statement. The Company’s press release announcing the appointment is attached to this Report as Exhibit 99.1.
